content: and pull loop through to front of work and through loop on hook repeat across row 6 8 10 sl sts worked do not fasten_off turn ribbing tube so that the slip_stitch row is to the inside the slip_stitch row is on the wrong side of the cuff you will now stitch into the edges of the previous row make the body of each mitten round 1 make 23 28 33 single_crochet sts equally spaced around top edge of ribbing 23 28 33 sts round 2 1 single_crochet into each of the next 10 12 15 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 9 12 14 sts 25 30 35 sts round 3 1 single_crochet into each st around 25 30 35 sts round 4 1 single_crochet into each of the next 11 13 16 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 10 13 15 sts 27 32 37 sts round 5 1 single_crochet into each st around 27 32 37 sts round 6 1 single_crochet into each of the next 12 14 17 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 11 14 16 sts 29 34 39 sts round 7 1 single_crochet into each st around 29 34 39 sts round 8 1 single_crochet into each of the next 13 15 18 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 12 15 17 sts 31 36 41 sts round 9 1 single_crochet into each st around 31 36 41 sts round 10 1 single_crochet into each of the next 14 16 19 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 13 16 18 sts 33 38 43 sts for preschool size only skip to round 16 after completing this round round 11 1 single_crochet into each st around older kids-38 women-43 sts round 12 1 single_crochet into each of the next 17 20 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 17 19 sts older kids-40 women-45 sts round 13 1 single_crochet into each st around older kids-40 women-45 sts for older kids size only skip to round 16 after completing this round round 14 1 single_crochet into each of the next 21 sts 2 single_crochet into the next st 1 single_crochet into each of the next 2 sts 2
